Reviews.Title: "A Best Buy"
Reviews.Author: J. White "BontifulGenius"
Reviews.Content: I haved owned this product for almost a year now. I did research on HDTV's in  it's size range of which this model was rated in the top three for CRT-HDTV's. The next best option, costing almost one thousand more??? "Simply Put" I'd make the purchase again. I'm still amazed at the excellent picture quality and sound.

ProductInfo.Features:
45-inch rear-projection CRT television; measures 48.2 x 42 x 19.2 inches (WxHxD)
Built-in HD/Digital tuner (ATSC), 181-channel  tuner (NTSC); Digital Cable ready
High-output CRT specifically developed for digital program content; 3:2 cinema pulldown; 3-line digital comb filter
Inputs: 4 composite, 2 S-Video, 2 component, 1 DVI, 1 monitor out
Two stereo speakers, 15 watts apiece (30 watts total); Dolby virtual surround sound
ProductInfo.Name: Zenith R45W47C 45-Inch CRT Projection 16:9 TV with Integrated HDTV
